9-0_training_50_0:
SELECT MIN(an.name) AS alternative_name, MIN(chn.name) AS character_name, MIN(t.title) AS movie
FROM aka_name AS an,
 char_name AS chn,
 cast_info AS ci,
 company_name AS cn,
 movie_companies AS mc,
 name AS n,
 role_type AS rt,
 title AS t
WHERE ci.movie_id = t.id
 AND t.id = mc.movie_id
 AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id
 AND mc.company_id = cn.id
 AND ci.role_id = rt.id
 AND n.id = ci.person_id
 AND chn.id = ci.person_role_id
 AND an.person_id = n.id
 AND an.person_id = ci.person_id
AND ci.note IN ('(uncredited)', '(production assistant)', '(production assistant)', '(voice)', '(voice)')
AND cn.country_code = '[us]'
AND mc.note IS NOT NULL 
AND (mc.note LIKE '%1984%' OR mc.note LIKE '%e%')
AND n.gender = 'f'
AND n.name LIKE '%C%'
AND rt.role = 'actress'
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1999 AND 2013;

AND rt.role = 'actor'

WHERE ci.movie_id = t.id
 AND t.id = mc.movie_id
 AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id
 AND mc.company_id = cn.id
 AND ci.role_id = rt.id
 AND n.id = ci.person_id
 AND chn.id = ci.person_role_id
 AND an.person_id = n.id
 AND an.person_id = ci.person_id
AND ci.note IN ('(co-producer)', '(uncredited)', '(co-producer)', '(script supervisor)', '(supervising producer)')
AND cn.country_code = '[us]'
AND mc.note IS NOT NULL 
AND (mc.note LIKE '%e%' OR mc.note LIKE '%2006%')
AND n.gender = 'm'
AND n.name LIKE '%David%'
AND rt.role = 'actor'
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 2003 AND 2004;

SELECT MIN(an.name) AS alternative_name, MIN(chn.name) AS character_name, MIN(t.title) AS movie
FROM aka_name AS an,
 char_name AS chn,
 cast_info AS ci,
 company_name AS cn,
 movie_companies AS mc,
 name AS n,
 role_type AS rt,
 title AS t
WHERE ci.movie_id = t.id
 AND t.id = mc.movie_id
 AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id
 AND mc.company_id = cn.id
 AND ci.role_id = rt.id
 AND n.id = ci.person_id
 AND chn.id = ci.person_role_id
 AND an.person_id = n.id
 AND an.person_id = ci.person_id
AND ci.note IN ('(writer)', '(writer)', '(production assistant)', '(executive producer)', '(voice)')
AND cn.country_code = '[us]'
AND mc.note IS NOT NULL 
AND (mc.note LIKE '%Canada%' OR mc.note LIKE '%DVD%')
AND n.gender = 'm'
AND n.name LIKE '%Frank%'
AND rt.role = 'actor'
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1963 AND 2002;

 char_name AS chn,

SELECT MIN(an.name) AS alternative_name, MIN(chn.name) AS character_name, MIN(t.title) AS movie
FROM aka_name AS an,
 char_name AS chn,
 cast_info AS ci,
 company_name AS cn,
 movie_companies AS mc,
 name AS n,
 role_type AS rt,
 title AS t
WHERE ci.movie_id = t.id
 AND t.id = mc.movie_id
 AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id
 AND mc.company_id = cn.id
 AND ci.role_id = rt.id
 AND n.id = ci.person_id
 AND chn.id = ci.person_role_id
 AND an.person_id = n.id
 AND an.person_id = ci.person_id
AND ci.note IN ('(uncredited)', '(uncredited)', '(uncredited)', '(uncredited)', '(uncredited)')

AND (mc.note LIKE '%r%' OR mc.note LIKE '%with%')
